website_summaries.verdict: Large capacity photo album that can hold up to 500 photos.
pros: If you have a lot of photos to place in an album, this product can accommodate your needs
Pages in the album are free from any harmful chemicals, keeping your photos safe
There's room to write messages next to the photos on the pages
cons: Design of the cover may be boring to some
Price is higher than the other albums

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality... Disappointing because I loved the album until it tore and came unglued.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first even though the photos slide around somewhat. It's been a year since I put photos in or even opened this album but I decided to finish filling it up tonight and it tore when I opened it! I am so frustrated! It says lifetime warranty so how do I get it replaced?
customer_reviews.author: bayou_baby

customer_reviews.title: Strong book, but pockets are a problem
customer_reviews.text: The 500 photo pocket album is sturdy (for example, the album did not fall apart after all photos were inserted). However, the pockets are LOOSE and cause the photos to SLIDE around. So, i had to incur an extra expense, by buying the self-adhesive photo squares to ensure that the photos would stay in place. Additionally, the horizontal (left to right) pockets are open-ended; Despite the pocket flaws, i kept the album because finding a durable photo album to hold 500 photos was exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: MadRoach

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This album is huge! I'm so happy with this purchase, I can't wait to fill it all up. I only gave it 4/5 stars because I wish some pages were different with how many horizontal/vertical slots there are. Each page has 2 vertical and 3 horizontal, it would be nice if every few pages that was alternated. The plastic seems to be thick enough, I haven't sliced any of it yet. the horizontal slots do not have a stopper on one side, so photos can go all the way through and potentially fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Pictures fall out
customer_reviews.text: This was the only album I was able to find that held 500 photos AND had writing space. So I kept it even though it’s a pretty terrible album. The sleeves are open on both ends so the pictures slide out every time we look at the album. Unfortunately there doesn’t seem to be a better option out there so I will probably by another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent family albums
customer_reviews.text: I love these albums. The pages are large so you can group together 5 pictures per page, and 10 per spread. I like that there are vertical and horizontal slots on each page. I buy a new one every January and put together all the photos from the previous year. I set some of these out at our wedding for people to look through. They are handsome, sturdy, and durable. I also like that there's space on the binding to write the year. I bought a metallic paint pen and it shows up great against the black. These are heirloom quality. I expect to buy them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne R Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Memory Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I created a set of family memories into these albums. I understand that technology is awesome but these moments captured in an album that is sturdy, large , and will stand the test of time were important to me. The pictures within their pages will be a family conversation starter for many years to come even without a cellphone present.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Trent

customer_reviews.title: Great photo album
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 5 of these so far. I like the classiness of them. No bright or trendy colors. I like they have vertical and horizontal slots for pictures. I do add a little adhesive to some pics. Some of the sleeves are looser than others, which is slightly annoying, but easily corrected. As I fill them, I’ll order more.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: For the person that take to many pictures
customer_reviews.text: Album is nice that it holds 500 pictures. The page sleeves are very thin and flimsy. It doesn't take much to have the plastic pull loose from the page. Some review complained about the binding coming loose, but I haven't had any issues with that.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine A Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Classy, elegant, and hold hundreds of memories
customer_reviews.text: I love this photo album. I’m in the process of putting thousands of photos into neat albums and I came across this. Not only is it high quality & elegant, but it holds SO many photos. The ooooonly downside is you have to be care full when putting the photos into the sleeves because if you are a little heavy handed, you are going to rip the divider and you will have a big open space. I will most definitely be buying another one as soon as I fill this one up 
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: quality is decreasing on these
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed. I have always bought these over the years and probably have about 20 of them. Its been my go to for years. This last album I bought is poor quality. The adhesions were missing. The pages were loose. not worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Owens

customer_reviews.title: I still like to print few photos from trips
customer_reviews.text: I still like to print few photos from trips, so when people are around we can pass an album without having to show them every picture on the computer or TV. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because of the price (I guess people do not buy albums anymore) and the sleeves are not the best way I would put away pictures in albums. I do miss the 504-picture albums you used to get at national stores and this is the best replacement for now. Recommended if you have no other choice.
customer_reviews.author: Arin

customer_reviews.title: Iffy quality, but pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Some of the sleeves for pictures weren't properly fastened to the actual page, rendering them useless. It was only 2 pages in my album but the pages are not easily removable so its annoying to flip through the album and have blank pages. Some of the other sleeves had one or two of their pockets loose but werent completely unuseable. I have questions about how durable this album will be long-term. Other than that its a nice-looking album and holds 95% of what is advertised after accounting for the faulty pages and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: mars808

customer_reviews.title: this is a great album. The pictures easily slide into their slots
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great album. The pictures easily slide into their slots. The slots are comprised of a thin sheet of plastic that has two fasteners punched through to make the spaces for the photos. This seems to be its weakest line, so be gentle when handling the album and it should be a good place for your photos for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: silicawood

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be of excellent quality and very durable
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be of excellent quality and very durable. The pages are nicely set up with space for 5 pictures (up to a 4 x 6 size) on every page, front and back. I was looking for a good place to put my many photos from when my children were little. These are acid free and will be a perfect way to store my pictures. There is also room to write a short label for each picture. I love these albums and I now they will be used for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Cathypete

customer_reviews.title: Both vertical and horizontal storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great photo album. It's large and holds a lot of photos both vertically and horizontally. The pages are sturdy. I own 5 of these so far. Very nice and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the plastic this album was encased in, it smelled strongly of something that reminded me of motor oil. It was so bad I sealed it back up and immediately prepared the return to get it out of my house. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer photo album
customer_reviews.text: This album was the perfect decision for my hundreds of vacation photos. Room to include information about each picture made it super easy to journal my trip. Photos just side into the sleeves. I added a little adhesive to my photos just to keep Them secure.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M. Barnhouse

customer_reviews.title: ... excited when this arrived and thought that it looked great. When I started to put the photos in
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when this arrived and thought that it looked great. When I started to put the photos in, though, I realized that a lot of the photo slots are very tight around the photos. It is almost impossible to insert them without damaging the seems or tearing a hole in the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Riley A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one f these that I have ordered. The first one was fine. This one smells so strongly of caustic glue that I am returning it. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to relive the trip with this album
customer_reviews.text: I tookk a trip around the ring of Kerry in Ireland and took around 500 pictures and have it on flash drive but wanted a album large enough to hold them all. This album has the space PLUS it has an area down the middle to explain what and where there were taken. It is nice to relive the trip with this album.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected...
customer_reviews.text: The corners of the album are not real leather. The inside pockets are not sealed on one end so the pictures can slide right through.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as expected...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic outside cover is all wrinkled up when received out of the box. Although one can remove and throw away the cover, it would be nice if the cover was somewhat decent enough to keep on and help protect the album. The other issue with this album is that the plastic sleeves that holds the pictures in are flimsy. The tear easily when sliding pictures in causing the album to fall apart before it is even used...Overall, I would say to anyone looking into this, stay away, spend a few dollars more and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Great album, but very large!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is huge. Keep that in mind. I bought it with plans on filling it with vacation photos/ camping trip pics, and it is massive. We have those Kallax shelves from Ikea, and this thing will not fit in the cubby standing up. I still love it. Feels like a quality album. Will most likely use it as a table book.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ussery

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room For Big Projects
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for a big photo project. The album has a nice classic-design cover and plenty of room for 4x6 photos. Generally I'm satisfied. There are only two aspects that could impede efficient and effective use: 1) photo insertion into the sleeves takes a bit of patience and 2) the pages are fixed, i.e., not removable, requiring careful planning to avoid reshuffling or repeated reorganizing of photos. Definitely discard the plastic protector to avoid inhalation of the wretched petroleum-product off-gassing.
customer_reviews.author: hulithedane

customer_reviews.title: Large Enough For A Lot Of Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this photo album. Should last for more years then I will. Looks good enough to give as a gift. PROS Large overall size. Holds 500. Paper pages are nice and thick. Nice cover (also has a thick clear plastic cover over the fabric for protection) Holds 5 6x4 pictures per page. Three horizontal and two vertical. No three hole binding system to get snagged. Room to add notes on each page. CONS Clear plastic over pictures is thin. Hope will hold up to the years. Pictures slide under plastic allowing smaller then 6x4 to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great size but not put together well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the size and because the lay out lets you place pictures both vertical and horizontal. However the construction of the album is not great. Some pics slide around inside. I personally would not recommend this product to another person.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brockington

customer_reviews.title: Great photo album
customer_reviews.text: These photo albums are by far my favorite. I have one for each kid for their first year of photos. They hold up well and are nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing old photos. I liked that there was space in the middle to write on so you don't have to keep touching the photos to look at the back.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could use more customization features
customer_reviews.text: The pockets in this album would be more useful if they were separated with some sort of snap or fastener that could be popped out to allow for larger photos and snapped back in later, if necessary. I like to arrange my albums chronologically, but because each page includes just two sizes/orientations, I found it difficult to fill each page in order. Also, because the pages are not removable, if I want to change the page order, I would have to take out every photo up to the page I want to switch and start over.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Missing adhesive on sleeves - pictures slide around
customer_reviews.text: These (ordered 2) albums look great, but when I had already inserted about 350 pictures out of almost 1000, I got to several pages where the adhesive was missing on the plastic sleeves and have tried all kinds of things to secure the photos... needless to say, the defective pages have made this task a pain, as the pictures slide around and won't stay securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: kls

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Huge book that holds a lot of pictures....I have yet to put pictures inside but it definitely holds a lot
customer_reviews.author: Durant

customer_reviews.title: Big dimension
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, this is a big album! May not fit on the book shelf standing up. I wanted to get an album that fits a lot of the photos I have at home and this fits the bill. Cover is plain, nothing special. Construction seems sturdy. There is a narrow column (about an inch wide) running down the page for you to write brief notes. Each page can fit 3 landscape and 2 portrait photos. Photo sleeves seem snug and haven't had any problem of photos falling out. Decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great photo albums!
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing these albums a few years ago to keep family photos organized and in matching albums. The albums hold 500 photos and are very sturdy. The covers are strong, and I anticipate these albums holding up for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: CLV

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst than an envelope!!! Every thing keeps falling out of it. The plastic that is meant to hold the pictures in place is very flimsy and slack. All i can think of is gluing pictures on and that is not a good option. The hard cover is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Stores a ton of photos
customer_reviews.text: Even though we have digital photos these days, my wife still loves printing them out and putting them in a photo album. We've purchased these several times - probably have 6 or 7 now. High quality photo album, and stores a ton of photos.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Binding isn't secure; photos don't stay put
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item previously and it was really a great photo album so I bought another one. However, this one is TERRIBLE. All of the pages are loose and most of the plastic sleeves are ripped. I was very excited because the first one was so good, however, I can't buy a 3rd because of how awful the second one is. From now on, I'll stick to the 300-photo photo albums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful album, high capacity
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking album. My only gripe is that I'm a little concerned having to remove/switch photos around, as I've seen this type of album (not this exact one) have the plastic sleeves tear easily, even when handled with care. I've only partially filled my album so I hope to keep filling it for years to come. Love that it's high capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but the product arrived with the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but the product arrived with the plastic material to insert photos into unattached on several pages. I would have returned, but I bought the product as a gift for children who may accidentally damage anyways. I don't know why this was the case, but I'm sure it was a rare occurence; although it did happen in both photo books that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: 5stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these albums. I have ordered them over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will probably buy a 3rd.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought it as a gift for my grandma, and it was so nice that I bought a 2nd one for myself! They hold a lot of photos, very nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I hit the jackpot with the number of slots available in this book. But I have not even owned it a week and it’s already broken. Don’t waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: BGR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cover and dimensions of this photo album. I wanted to stock my shelf with this book until I actually tried to fill it with photos. The plastic covering over the photos is very thin and tears very easy. I don't think this photo album is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... own a few of these albums already and I love that you can fit 500 pictures
customer_reviews.text: I own a few of these albums already and I love that you can fit 500 pictures! I have years of pictures on my computer that I printed and put into these albums! Love to be able to flip back through our memories in these albums! We forget how time flies and with everything being digital nowadays, how often do we flip back through our old pictures and reminisce!
customer_reviews.author: Norma L. Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: High-capacity Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this album for my girlfriends birthday to put in all of our photos from our trips. I really enjoyed the layout of the album and the capacity of how many photos they can hold. Each page, front and back, has three horizontal slots and two vertical slots. It worked out perfectly for the photos that I chose to include. It does have an interesting smell when brand-new, but that goes away with time. I only wish that the album had different cover choices. The pages are very strong and the plastic does not rip like in other albums. If you were looking for a high-capacity photo album, I suggest you purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Seems Nice, but Poor Photo Seperation
customer_reviews.text: High capacity. Used to sort my husband's box of childhood photos. Photo separators are very weak though so photos keep falling out and falling together. Disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly2989

customer_reviews.title: Good deal! plastic smell - air out window, no big deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, basic photo book. I wasn't looking for anything fancy, but still love the quality. Smells of plastic when it arrives, air it out the window for a few hours. It's really not a big deal for the money you are saving. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Vandal

customer_reviews.title: I honestly do not smell anything bad and album is quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 album just to see the quality of this product and smell few were complaining about. I honestly do not smell anything bad and album is quality product. I purchased 3 more since I have lots of pictures to fill it with.
customer_reviews.author: MLee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase, absolutely appalled. If I could return I would.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with purchase. Spent over two hrs putting pictures in and they all but fell out. They do not stay in place. Everyone has their own way, suggestions but this did not work for my usage. If you want to just "throw them in something" it will work until you turn the page.
customer_reviews.author: tracey tillman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this album to work, but sadly my photos fall out as you turn the pages, or pick it up. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product; large capacity for those of us who still do this kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Moxiereader

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy Buy - Nothing Better
customer_reviews.text: The BEST BEST! This is my hobby & searched for Years to Find the most secure & acttractive Way to display my previous photos - look no further / This is iT,
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful album! The price is very fair for what you get. This is our first family album and I am so happy that there are plenty of slots for verticle AND horizontal pictures. Plus, the space to write stuff is adequate for a quick note but not if you want to write a big story about the pictures. I can't wait to start filling it up with pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Cari O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality photo album
customer_reviews.text: Great quality photo album. The plastic inside that holds the pictures seems to be good as well. Only one or two of them ripped when I was putting my pictures inside, but then again, I know I was working quickly and not being careful which is probably why it did that. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great album, poor binding
customer_reviews.text: Only giving two stars because the binding came apart when I began to place photos in. I did however use crazy glue to glue it back and so far, so good. I like the album itself but only gave two starts due to the poor binding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Photos Slip Out of Pockets
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK photo album. After I filled the book from cover to cover with photos and began to show the book to people, the photos would slip out of the plastic covering as you are flipping the pages. For this reason, it gets 3 stars. Otherwise, it is a very nice looking and big photo album.
customer_reviews.author: emgriff

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is high capacity, but if the photos are smaller than 4 x 6 inches, they don't stay in place. They tend to fall out when you turn the page. Very annoying. Since so many of my photos were smaller, I had to return the album.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Heath

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want in a photo album!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these photo books--I love them--they look classy--hold photos well --very good quality covers and sheets--occasionally I get a bit rough putting a photo in the slot and loosen the seal between the frames but a tiny bit of scotch tape or glue fixes that--- I have over a dozen of these books and only one separated from the binder-- no problem with elmer glue it was good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: was a good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: was a good buy for the money. The plastic tore a little here and there when adding the photos so I wish it wasn't so flimsy there but overall good album. I do wish they made more attractive looking ones at this capacity too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was a good purchase. It fit all my photos ans had room to write doen little snipets for each foto. It is big and heavy as expected. The only thing that prevented me from givng a 5 was that quality could be improved. Some slots where torn or plastic would come off very easily when inserting photos then you cant get your photos to stay in place. This happened a out 4 times throughout book
customer_reviews.author: maria aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. I like that it has a mix ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I like that it has a mix between of both horizontal and vertical slots. The fact that it holds so many photos is also great. My only complaint us that it seems a bit flimsy. Some of the slots have already pulled away from the page. And rhe beige color is boring. But overall not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LMN11

customer_reviews.title: A great place to store memories
customer_reviews.text: My wife now has a place to keep all of our family photos. The quality of the book is very good and we did not notice any of the issues with photos sliding out as you turn the page as some other have mentioned. Once this book is full I will be purchasing another to ad to our collection of family memories.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D.

customer_reviews.title: Pages didn't hold pictures in Securely!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a larger album. Love Other pioneer Albums for but not this one. The picture dividers on each page reminded me of a single bubble packaging bubble. They popped and pictures slid out. Returned. I do not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stacks

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I love these albums. I take a lot of family pictures and this is my favorite album. Just purchased my 7th one and have had no problems. My first one is probably 12 years old.
customer_reviews.author: dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Unfortunately I bought 5 of these and waited a month until I opened one up to start loading pictures, so I’m past the return window. Super flimsy, pictures come right out.
customer_reviews.author: K J

customer_reviews.title: I already bought a second
customer_reviews.text: For high capacity it's great. Cover looks well made, pages and slots are a little delicate but decent care when inserting photos will prevent damage. This is what I'll buy again for large capacity albums. Wish there were more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: poor  quality
customer_reviews.text: The plastic that holds the pictures to the page is not secure and the bond separate easily. The pictures fall out when you turn the page.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: I love this album
customer_reviews.text: I love this album ! It holds lots of pictures and protects them well. I have purchased several and have always been satisfied and have had some for a few years now. It is kinda heavy when you get it full but I like having as many of the same trip in one album as possible.
customer_reviews.author: MKgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pockets don't hold photos
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected in terms of quality. Overall it felt really cheap and some of the pockets arrived broken. Even for the ones that weren't broken, half of the pockets don't properly hold the photos in. When you open and close the book, the page bends in such a way the photos slide out.
customer_reviews.author: Yungnan Liu

customer_reviews.title: The cover is nice but the picture slots are open on both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is okay. The cover is nice but the picture slots are open on both sides so the pictures slide out everytime I turn the pages
customer_reviews.author: Cincykid

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for someone who needs a large photo storage, love this. I will definitely order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I got these for $16 it was a great price. I have been printing my baby pictures since he was born. I have already purchased over 10 total albums. Though some pages had a cheap touch
customer_reviews.author: Ema Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great high capacity album!
customer_reviews.text: Love this album! We've bought 4 and they're all wonderful. I love how there are spaces for both horizontal and vertical photos as well as space to write comments! The high capacity is a must with as many photos as I take! This time I applied a vinyl name decal and it looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Burden

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all..I would order another one
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with it, I would order another one
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love these albums
customer_reviews.text: This was a repeat order. Love these albums. Safe and great display for all photos.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R Scariot

customer_reviews.title: better than shoeboxes
customer_reviews.text: i have been carrying many shoe boxes apartment to apartment and i was starting to get frustrated to the point that maybe i was going to throw out all my memories. i was able to fit all of my photos in this baby and have tons more space! thank you for making my moves so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: hlb

customer_reviews.title: I love that this album fits a ton of photos
customer_reviews.text: I love that this album fits a ton of photos, and still leaves space to write notes. That's a hard combination to find. The binding is attractive and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you're using an archival product for family photos.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for, will hold many photos, a few vertically but mostly horizontal with small areas for notations. It's archival and will not ruin your photos and that's very important.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Has place to write about pictures
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can write in the margin. Would be better if it had a little more space. I ordered several to give as gifts. Only concern is some pgs don't hold the pictures well.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: I love the design for this album but a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the design for this album but a lot of the pages are not connected together and the pictures slide out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Slip Photos In...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I had around 2,500 proofs from my wedding photographer that I needed albums for. Having so many pictures, I was concerned that it would be time consuming and cumbersome to put each picture through the plastic slots of a photo album. Although time consuming (considering the amount I had), it was not cumbersome to put the photos through these slots. They slipped in rather easily. I put 1,000 pictures into two albums in around an hour and a half. I also like how each page has 2 vertical options and 3 horizontal options. Cons: The album is heavy once it is filled to capacity and shipping was delayed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought I think 6 of these! Lot of pages are coming loose where you insert photos! Lot of money for this to happen! Was going to order more but not sure now!
customer_reviews.author: John Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Works decently enough. Pictures are arranged so that each ...
customer_reviews.text: Works decently enough. Pictures are arranged so that each page has two upright photos and three sideways ones, so keep that in mind for layout of the photos. The plastic sleeves the photos go into are just glued to the paper backing, so they can tear if you aren't careful. The upright photos will fall out into the binding of the book every once in a while. But, you aren't going to find many books of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: great album
customer_reviews.text: High capacity album. Good, sturdy pages. A place to write notes for eah picture. The only con is that the canvas part of the cover will mark and smudge easily. Would have been better if it were 'leather' like the spine and corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than other albums
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can put in vertical and horizontal photos, and I appreciate the space on each page for notes. I only wish the photos didn't have the tendency to slide slightly out of their sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G

customer_reviews.title: Pictures fall out of the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully bound but after spending hours filling the pockets with 500 pictures, they slip out of the pockets when the pages are turned. I would not buy a second album for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love that there is a place to write what the ...
customer_reviews.text: Use the albums to create an album for each of my grandkids for their particular year in review. Love that there is a place to write what the picture is of or what is going on next to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Albums
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice as Christmas gifts, perfect. My husband used for his trip pics. Sturdy Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Natty in MS

customer_reviews.title: Other than this great photo
customer_reviews.text: Some smaller pictures do not stay in as well as others. Other than this great photo album
customer_reviews.author: Dave Long

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not sure if pictures are totally slip free.
customer_reviews.text: I like how much it holds, but the pockets are not as secure as I thought. Afraid pictures may slide out. So far, so good. Otherwise it is very durable looking, handsome exterior and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: but other than that it is a good quality photobook
customer_reviews.text: The slots are a little smaller than 4x6 so I've had to trim my pictures, but other than that it is a good quality photobook.
customer_reviews.author: Shela

customer_reviews.title: ... a lot of pictures and this photo book is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of pictures and this photo book is perfect for me! I have actually ordered three of these throughout the years. The qualit of this product is great. I couldn't find one that holds this many pictures for a fair price at the store. As long as Amazon keeps selling these I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: Great ar first...
customer_reviews.text: The album was exactly as described the photos went into the sleeves great, until about the last 200 pages then the photos were sliding out and not staying in, I had to eventually use tape to keep the sleeves secure and to keep the pictures from falling out. I wasn't too happy to have spent money on something I had to tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality album with lots of space for photos
customer_reviews.text: Good quality album with lots of space for photos, 5 photos per page (4x6) three landscape format and two portrait format per page. Holds 500 photos, which is a good amount. I bought it to put my wedding photos in and so far it's worked great! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Size is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice photo album. Just received so cannot say much about durability. However, the description of 12x12 is incorrect. The actual dimensions of the album cover is 13x13. Unfortunately, my shelf is 12.5 inches tall.........The pages are 12.5x12.5.
customer_reviews.author: Tape measure

customer_reviews.title: I still like them a lot because they hold so many pictures
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these albums for years. They hold all my family photos. The only problem is the binding should be stronger. Some binding on some of the books are falling apart. I still like them a lot because they hold so many pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Diskin

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get the pictures to stay put. They fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Tpeters314

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this album, especially as it holds so many photos. It is very well made, has an expensive look to it for the price. I bought two of them, wish I had bought more. I also like how it comes with a plastic covering over entire album to help protect the cover for many years keeping it clean from dust, dirt, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MJQ

customer_reviews.title: Binding is not great once it's close to getting filled
customer_reviews.text: Binding is not great once it's close to getting filled. I bought this to put my 500 pictures I had from a traveling trip and when I tried closing the album it was uneven and coming apart a bit and that was the first day i received the album.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: The second one I received was wonderful. Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this album, and when it arrived it had writing in it. They must have sent me one that someone used and then returned. I sent it back and asked for a replacement. The second one I received was wonderful. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a family member. all the photos fit nicely and the album itself is pretty sturdy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

product_meta.title: Pioneer Photo Albums High Capacity Photo Album, 500 Memo Pockets, Black and Beige
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1This high capacity photo album holds 500 4 x 6 inch photos in optically clear plastic pockets with a beige paper background. There is a memo area next to each photo. The album features a sewn beige fabric cover with black leatherette trim and a deluxe raised rounded bookbound spine. The unique five pocket page layout allows for three horizontal and two vertical photos to be displayed on the same page. Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free. Item measures approximately 2 x 13. 5 x 13 inches (L x W x H).
feature_bullets: High capacity photo album holds 500 photos up to 4"x6"
Beige fabric cover with black sewn leatherette trim and a deluxe raised rounded bookbound spine
Each page has 5 pockets to holds 3 horizontal and 2 vertical photos
Optically clear pockets with a beige paper background and memo writing area next to each pocket
Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars889 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
